description.text: our final task, retrieve the Elytra; from the End, or from a living soul if they claimed the Elytra...Should you perish...I would be free as well...

description.translate: We found it...and you are still alive...? I guess I server you now, Master...W-What? You consider me your friend and Im free to go? -The Pixie pats you on the head- I told you where a good person...
